- [ ] HTML/CSS/JS passes Prettifier
- [ ] Python passes Pylint
- [ ] Code is commented
- [ ] Code fulfills the requirements of the issue it is related to
- [ ] Code appears to functions properly
- [ ] Code integrates with existing code
